text: The FIFA U-16 World Championship 1987, the second edition of the tournament, was hosted by Canada and held in the cities of Montreal, Saint John, St. John's, and Toronto between 12 July and 25 July 1987. Players born after 1 August 1970 could participate in this tournament. Category:1987 in association football Category:FIFA competitions Category:1987 in North America
title: 1987 FIFA U-16 World Championship
